comment:
* An issue in the Safety Center. * *

An issue represents an actionable matter on the device of elevated importance. * *

It contains localized messages to display to the user, explaining the underlying threat or * warning and suggested fixes, and contains actions that a user may take from the UI to resolve the * issue. * *

Issues are ephemeral and disappear when resolved by user action or dismissal. * * @hide

variables.name: ISSUE_SEVERITY_LEVEL_OK
variables.comment: Indicates that this is low-severity, and informational.

variables.name: ISSUE_SEVERITY_LEVEL_RECOMMENDATION
variables.comment: Indicates that this issue describes a safety recommendation.

variables.name: ISSUE_SEVERITY_LEVEL_CRITICAL_WARNING
variables.comment: Indicates that this issue describes a critical safety warning.

methods.name: public String getId()
methods.comment:
* Returns the encoded string ID which uniquely identifies this issue within the Safety Center
     * on the device for the current user across all profiles and accounts.

methods.name: public CharSequence getTitle()
methods.comment: Returns the title that describes this issue.

methods.name: public CharSequence getSubtitle()
methods.comment: Returns the subtitle of this issue, or {@code null} if it has none.

methods.name: public CharSequence getSummary()
methods.comment: Returns the summary text that describes this issue.

methods.name: public CharSequence getAttributionTitle()
methods.comment:
* Returns the attribution title of this issue, or {@code null} if it has none. * *

This is displayed in the UI and helps to attribute issue cards to a particular source. * * @throws UnsupportedOperationException if accessed from a version lower than {@link * UPSIDE_DOWN_CAKE}

methods.name: public int getSeverityLevel()
methods.comment: Returns the {@link IssueSeverityLevel} of this issue.

methods.name: public boolean isDismissible()
methods.comment: Returns {@code true} if this issue can be dismissed.

methods.name: public boolean shouldConfirmDismissal()
methods.comment: Returns {@code true} if this issue should have its dismissal confirmed.

methods.name: public List<Action> getActions()
methods.comment:
* Returns the ordered list of {@link Action} objects that may be taken to resolve this issue. * *

An issue may have 0-2 actions. The first action will be considered the "Primary" action of * the issue.

methods.name: public String getGroupId()
methods.comment:
* Returns the ID of the {@link SafetySourcesGroup} that this issue belongs to, or {@code null} * if it has none. * *

This ID is used for displaying the issue on its corresponding subpage in the Safety Center * UI. * * @throws UnsupportedOperationException if accessed from a version lower than {@link * UPSIDE_DOWN_CAKE}

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
